subject: Critical: Production database down
description: The production database is down and all services are unavailable. This is a critical issue affecting all users.

subject: Cannot complete payment
description: I have tried multiple times to complete my payment but the system keeps rejecting it. I need help resolving this billing issue.

subject: Account locked after failed login attempts
description: My account has been locked after multiple failed login attempts. I cannot access my account anymore and need to be unlocked.

subject: Suggestion for mobile-friendly dashboard
description: The dashboard is not very mobile-friendly. Would it be possible to create a responsive mobile version of the dashboard?

subject: Export function not working
description: When I try to export data to Excel, the system throws an error. Steps to reproduce: Click export > Select Excel format > Error occurs.

subject: Refund still pending after 30 days
description: I submitted a refund request 30 days ago and have not received the funds yet. Can you check the status of my refund?

subject: Typo in error message
description: Found a typo in the error message that says 'occured' instead of 'occurred'. It's a minor issue but should be fixed.

subject: Need access recovery
description: I cannot access my account and the security questions seem to have been changed without my knowledge. I need help recovering my account.

subject: API rate limiting too aggressive
description: The API rate limiting is preventing legitimate requests from going through. We need higher rate limits or a way to request increased limits.

subject: Request for advanced reporting
description: Could you add more advanced reporting features? We need the ability to create custom reports and export them in various formats.

subject: Session timeout too short
description: The session timeout is too short. I get logged out frequently even when actively using the application.

subject: Security vulnerability in login form
description: Found a potential security vulnerability in the login form. The password is visible in the HTML source code.

subject: Multiple charges on my account
description: I see multiple identical charges on my account for the same transaction. This appears to be a duplicate billing error.

subject: UI button alignment issue
description: The submit button on the form page appears to be misaligned and overlaps with other elements. It's just a cosmetic issue but should be fixed.

subject: Two-factor authentication not sending codes
description: I enabled two-factor authentication but I am not receiving the SMS codes. Cannot complete the login process.

subject: Request for dark mode
description: Many users have requested a dark mode theme for the application. Would be nice to have this feature for eye comfort.

subject: Import data function crashing
description: When I try to import more than 1000 records, the import process crashes and loses all the data.

subject: Invoice email format issue
description: The invoice emails are not displaying correctly in Outlook. The formatting is broken.

subject: Cannot change email address
description: I want to change the email associated with my account but the system is not allowing me to update it.

subject: Performance optimization needed
description: The dashboard takes several seconds to load even with a fast internet connection. Performance optimization is needed.
